thread.title: disappointing W -
thread.title_full: disappointing W - Review of W New York - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mr J
title: disappointing W -
text:
W stands for wretched at the first W hotel to fall short for me. This Times Square property lacked the usual welcome. Its garish, deafening music 'living room' led to the elevators and my room. A lovely view of the windows of the adjaecent office buidling. The climate control did not work in the room, front desk explained the two-pipe system could not be adjusted and setting for cool just brought more hot air. I roasted and could not sleep. The servers were rude at breakfast and I skipped it running late. The hotel manager offer me some minor hotel point compensation, which I refused as not good enough, but he posted them anyway as this gesture ended the matter for the hotel. My advice is run away, stay somewhere else. This was one of my worst stays ever in many decades of travel.
Was not just me, fellow guests in elevator and lobby were complaining loudly as well.
W Times Square certainly did its best to disappoint.
Room Tip: go elswhere See more room tips Green Features: SPG is usally eco friendly but I cannot say for this one
